name: Busigence Technologies
description:
Busigence is a Decision Intelligence Company. Scaling startup by IIT alumni working on highly disruptive big data technologies. We create decision intelligence products for real people by combining data, technology, business, and behavior enabling strengthened decisions. 
To world, we offer Data Engineering, Data Science, Decision Analytics, and Decision Modeling. Our mission is to make the world decision intelligent. We envision to have worked on atleast 1% of worlds data by 2020.
We are working on our product H2H Data (www.h2hdata.com), data preparation platform, Marketing4i (www.marketing4i.com), marketing intelligence platform, and emmoQ (www.emmoq.com), emotion intelligence platform. Besides, we have already served 25+ good customers on solutions & services leveraging business intelligence, big data, and data sciences.
